TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ClientRenderingException extends Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewerException

Docs.summary: Represents errors that occur when the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer"> control is rendering a processed report from report page layout (RPL) format into GDI+ format.
Docs.remarks: ## Remarks For errors that occur in local processing mode when processing a report or when rendering into RPL format, see <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.LocalProcessingException>. For errors that occur in remote processing mode when processing a report or when rendering into RPL format, see <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportServerException>.
